meanings.definition: A Greek sauce made from yogurt, cucumber, garlic, and dill.
meanings.sent1: I love to dip my vegetables in tzatzikis.
meanings.sent2: The gyro came with a side of tzatzikis.
meanings.sent3: The tzatzikis decided to have a dance party with the pita bread.
meanings.sent4: The refreshing tzatzikis was a cool breeze on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent5: The creamy tzatzikis added a burst of flavor to the dish.
